entries.name: Spells
entries: Presentati in ordine alfabetico, questi incantesimi sono usati dai personaggi e dai mostri di questo set.

Alcuni incantesimi causano {@b conditions}, inclusi {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition invisible}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition prone}, {@condition restrained} e {@condition unconscious}. Consulta {@book appendix A|RMR|4} per conoscere gli effetti di una condizione nel gioco.
{@comic {@comicH3 Pure Jerry spell!} Perché aiutare gli altri quando potresti potenziarti con la magia e spaccare ancora di più?!}
{@comic This is for theater majors and Jerrys. Don't worry about divining the future when you play D&D, Morty. The story will find you when you start killing.}
{@comic Jerry spell in full effect! Don't waste your spell slots helping other people! You know what'll help them even more? If you {@b kill} le creature {@b attacking} tutti!}
{@comic Almost a Jerry spell, but at least you can pump up a bunch of people so they can kill s*** better.}
{@comic If I wanna see blurry, shifting, wavering people in front of me, I'll just keep drinking.}
{@comic {@i "Sheet of Flames"} sembra un concept album heavy metal.}
{@comic I dig it.}
{@comic Jerry needs this spell just to make friends.}
{@comic If you really wanna charm someone, do what everyone else does—get rich and buy their loyalty.}
{@comic As much as forcing people to grovel amuses me, it's easier to make 'em fear you by lighting all their s*** on {@i fire}.}
{@comic Save your spell slots, Morty.}
{@comic The only language you need to know in D&D is {@comicH3 the language of violence}, Morty.}
{@comic Everyone speaks it and translations are crystal clear. Jerrys want to talk through a battle or "parlay" their asses out of conflict. Never do that.}
{@comic It's a necessary evil. When you get hurt, you gotta get {@i healed}. Io consiglio {@b not} di farsi male.}
{@comic {@comicH3 Pure Jerry.} Questo è un combattimento tra la vita e la morte, non un cazzo {@b rave}.}
{@comic Not as good as blasting monsters, but it has its place. Getting the drop on some sucker and gutting 'em is pretty sweet.}
{@comic Anything that helps you find more magic loot is fine by me.}
{@comic Why would I waste a spell slot to just get rid of someone else's spell?}
{@comic {@i That's so stupid}!}
{@comic Abjuration is the {@b worst}, Morty. È così Jerry.}
{@comic Wanna freak people out? Jump off an airship, and while everyone's screaming, "He's gonna die!", cast this little number after you pass through a cloud.}
{@comic You'll float safely to the ground, while those suckers are tearily planning your funeral.}
{@comic If you're a wizard and don't take this when it comes available, then just eat your own character sheet.}
{@comic This is {@b the} classico {@comicH3 pyro-bomb} ed è bellissimo, Morty. Mettilo in una stanza piena di mostri e tira fuori i marshmallow.}

{@comic This is {@i fireball's} fratello minore leggermente rachitico, Morty. Detto questo, c'è {@i is} qualcosa di visceralmente soddisfacente nel far rotolare una palla di fuoco sopra un mucchio di stronzi.}
{@comic Peeing on your opponents from above is a top shelf move.}
{@comic If you need this spell to make your ability check, maybe you just shouldn't do that thing you're doing? Stay in your lane, Jerry.}
{@comic Awwww yeah, {@comicH3 God Bolt}. Dai loro quel danno radioso dove il sole non splende.}
{@comic You can just utter a word to yourself and you feel quantifiably better, Morty! Your life's essence goes back up! Who needs a long rest!}
{@comic Stopping some dingus in their tracks is aight. Not as cool as lighting them on fire, but maybe that's step two.}
{@comic Learning what magic loot you just pulled off the corpses of your vanquished foes is a worthwhile investment.}
{@comic "Necrotic damage" is a classy way of saying "your taint just rotted off."}
{@comic Drop eldritch vengeance on your enemies and then VORP right outta sight. {@b Classic}.}
{@comic The world of D&D is a dirty place, Morty. Th-th-they don't have body wash or tetanus shots or even tweezers. It's disgusting when you think about it.}
{@comic They should just call this spell {@i "Magic Soap."}}
{@comic When you're going down in a dirty hole to kill monsters, it's kinda useful to be able to see where the f*** they are.}
{@comic If you're stupid and didn't pick up fireball, then you better grab this. Zap, Crackle, Pop, b*****s!}

{@comic {@comicH3 Abjuration} di solito è spazzatura, ma poiché i maghi sono costretti ad andare in giro indossando {@comicH3 toilet paper} per proteggersi perché Wizards of the Coast pensa di essere OP, questo incantesimo potrebbe effettivamente mantenerti in vita.}
{@comic Push stuff around.}
{@comic Trigger a trap from a safe distance.}
{@comic Mess with your friends.}
{@comic Pick your horse's nose while riding said horse.}
{@comic {@b I-I can keep going.}}
{@comic Notice this spell's most {@b important} caratteristica, Morty: {@comicH3 NO ATTACK ROLL.}}
{@comic It hits and hurts. Simple-dimple. Little glowing arrows of death at your command, and nobody can do s*** about it.}
{@comic Smart clerics hold this spell in reserve until their party members pay up. These heals don't come cheap.}
{@comic Perfect for ripping a big nasty fart and then moving elsewhere for maximum deniability.}

{@comic That 10-minute casting time is a {@i buzzkill}, ma quando il tuo equipaggio si occupa dei tempi di inattività, ti dà qualcosa di cui occuparti in modo da non dover partecipare ai loro rituali di legame attorno al fuoco.}

{@comic I bet at first glance you figured I'd call this as a Jerry spell, but it's {@i not}, Morty. La prestidigitazione è {@b awesome}! Non occupa nessuno slot incantesimo perché è un trucchetto. Ciò significa che puoi usarlo {@b constantly}... e tu {@i should}.}

{@comic Everywhere your wizard goes, they'll have glittering teeth, musky magic cologne, a warming glow, and their own personal soundtrack. Clean clothes, too. The other members of your party are gonna shamble into town smelling like ass while you get to be Slick McDick, Wizard Supreme.}
{@comic Don't waste third level spell slots on protecto-trash. Kill your enemies fast and you won't even need defense.}
{@comic This is it, Morty, the third of the holy triumvirate of low-level wizard DPS. It's a song of ice {@b and} fuoco {@b AND} fulmine.}
{@comic Wait, the material component for this is "a miniature cloak"?}
{@comic Who the f*** is running around with a pouch full of miniature cloaks?}
{@comic Wizards of the Coast, whatever you're smoking, I want some.}
{@comic Calling the spell "Have you tried {@i not} morendo?" sarebbe più accurato, ma non così accattivante.}
{@comic Not bad, but radiant damage means your enemy's clothes don't catch on fire, so it's not as funny.}
{@comic Don't worry about {@b protecting} cose, Morty. Tutto muore.}

{@comic The spellcasting equivalent of a {@b jockstrap}: utile nelle giuste circostanze, ma molto più interessante se puoi fare le tue cose senza averne bisogno e alla fine avrà bisogno di essere lavato.}
{@comic I dunno, I kinda respect this.}
{@comic A cleric who takes 10 minutes to {@status concentration||concentrate} su quanto amano il loro dio, quindi {@i you} può ricevere pugni più forti. È piuttosto metallico.}
{@comic Like shuffling your feet on a carpet just before slapping some sense into a goblin.}
{@comic I like busting this one out on enemy spellcasters and then throwing up the universal sign language for "Oops! Guess you're f***ed!"}
{@comic A spell that requires me to tiptoe around the battlefield is not my style, Morty. Like, I get that it can be useful, but it still just feels like a stopgap.}
{@comic It's not {@i full} Jerry, ma non è nemmeno affrettato nella mia lista di incantesimi preparata.}
{@comic I enjoy throwing spells down from above while walking on the ceiling. I'm man enough to admit it.}
{@comic Crazy ghosts that zap monsters for you?}
{@comic That's f***ing cool.}
{@comic It's more hands-off than my typical "crush your enemies, see them driven before you" approach, but I definitely see the appeal.}
{@comic There's {@i nothing} demoralizzante quanto essere colpiti da un grande vecchio {@comicH3 ghost schlong}.}
{@comic Here's a {@b real} suggerimento: non prendere un incantesimo che richieda 10 minuti di discussione al tavolo per capire se ha funzionato o meno.}
{@comic This spell wants to be prestidigitation for clerics, but it's definitely on the weak side. Here's some harmless tremors for you—*FAAART*}
{@comic Let this baby fly when the bass drops, Morty. Trust me. The crowd will go {@i wild}.}
{@comic Here's a better idea: How about I {@i don't} collega la mia forza vitale a qualcun altro? Non conosco né mi fido di nessuno di questi pagliacci.}
{@comic I'm not here to tell anyone {@b where} e {@b when} dovrebbero scaricare il loro carico appiccicoso personale, sai? Q-que-è una scelta personale.}
{@comic Everybody needs to make their own decisions.}

data.name: Appendix A: Conditions
entries: Le condizioni alterano le capacità di una creatura in vari modi e possono verificarsi come risultato di un incantesimo, di un privilegio di classe, dell'attacco di un mostro o di altri effetti. La maggior parte delle condizioni, come {@condition blinded}, sono menomazioni, ma alcune, come {@condition invisible}, possono essere vantaggiose.

Una condizione dura finché non viene neutralizzata (la condizione {@condition prone} viene contrastata alzandosi in piedi, ad esempio) o per una durata specificata dall'effetto che ha imposto la condizione.

Se più effetti impongono la stessa condizione a una creatura, ogni istanza della condizione ha la propria durata, ma gli effetti della condizione non peggiorano. Una creatura può avere una condizione oppure no.
Le seguenti definizioni specificano cosa succede a una creatura mentre è soggetta a una condizione.

data.name: {@comicH1 APPENDIX B: WHAT IS THE F***ING POINT?!}
entries: {@comic {@comicH3 Okay, Morty.} Forse sono solo la vodka e i tranquillanti a parlare, b-b-ma penso che abbiamo raggiunto un momento critico nella tua formazione su D&D. S-s-hai interiorizzato molte delle funzionalità principali e tremi per l'attesa delle avventure a venire.}
{@comic That's good, that's real good. Now your grandpa Rick's gonna blow your tiny mind and teach you the {@b deepest} e {@b darkest} parte di D&D...}
{@comic {@b {@i {@comicH4 NONE OF THIS MATTERS}.}}}
{@comic What?!}
{@comic YEAH.}
{@comicH1 the rules don't MEAN S***.}
{@comic I know what you're thinking. You're thinking,}

{@comic {@i "Why the hell did I just go through over sixty pages of dice and rolling and systems and spells and whatever else if none of it matters?! Why do millions of people play this weird nerdy game and invest themselves in it if none of it matters?!"}}

{@comic Y-y-your brain is focused on the game as it is, instead of the game as it {@b could} sii, Morty. I-I-ti ho detto all'inizio che D&D è un {@i portal gun} e lo intendevo sul serio, anche mentre stavo provando a sparare a Wizards of the Coast e ai loro contatori di fagioli del signore supremo.}
{@comic People don't live heroic lives, Morty. They trudge through their feeble existence wishing they had some kind of b-b-b-*BURP*-bigger role in the universe.}
{@comic {@comicH3 That's what D&D really is, Morty.}}

{@comic It's a weird little place where everyone gets to gut goblins and blast bugbears and be kinda sorta awesome for a little while. Sometimes it's weird and annoying but when it works, Morty, when it really {@b works} e i tuoi giocatori sono come pasta nel palmo della tua mano: le loro speranze e i loro sogni dipendono da ogni tua parola e da un lancio di dadi....}
{@comic That's why we do this, get it?}
{@comic You know I-I-I'm not a fan of {@i bureaucracy} o-o-o {@i systems}. Non lo faccio {@b absolutes}. Nemmeno tu dovresti.}

{@comic I can teach you D&D Rickth Edition and make it {@b obvious} quello che {@i should} farai, ma alla fine lo farai a modo tuo. Rovinerai tutto e farai un pasticcio, e poi ricomincerai da capo e poi rovinerai tutto in modi nuovi e diversi.}
{@comic Good.}
{@comic {@comicH3 Roll the dice. Get stupid.}}
{@comicH1 entertain yourself. entertain your friends too.}
{@b {@i {@comicH4 THE REST DOESN'T MATTER}.}}
{@comic The rest is just corporate branding and nostalgia, sucking face with nihilistic attention-seeking edgelords in search of the mighty dollar.}
{@comic Yeah, I said it.}
{@comic {@comicH3 Truth bomb barr}*uuuuurrrrp*{@comicH3 age!}}
{@comic Ready to see how a {@b master} crea un'esperienza di dungeon memorabile, Morty? Tieni le natiche strette e dai un'occhiata al {@b adventure book}:}
{@comicH1 {@adventure The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy|RMBRE}}
